title: Git Challenge: Edit the Last Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase. One of the most common tasks when working with Git is to edit the last commit. This can be useful when you need to make small changes to a commit that you have already made.

steps.title: Git Challenge: Edit the Last Commit
